title: 2018 3 bedroom Manufactured Home for Rent
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: Enjoy life in Oakland Glens, an exceptional place to live.
Our community is located on the Novi and Walled Lake border, giving you direct access to so many great local offerings!
Public access to Walled Lake, shopping, dining and entertainment options all located with just a few miles.
Currently, we are offering a 2018 model year, at 1056 sq. feet.
This home will not last long!
Call today to schedule a tour and get a glimpse of what it’s like to live in a highly sought-after community in Novi.
